DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : The maximum body weight lifetime associate onset development type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Maximum Body Weight Lifetime Development Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity well recognize risk factor type 2 diabetes . Recent study report weight change , especially severe weight gain associate increase risk type 2 diabetes . The aim study investigate whether maximum body weight lifetime associate early onset type 2 diabetes increase risk type 2 diabetes Korean .
DOC.criteria: Korean type 2 diabetes Korean confirm IFG IGT Korean NGT Malignancy except thyroid cancer Active tuberculosis
